trait.name: Charge
entries: If Romul moves at least 10 ft. straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 9 ({@damage 2d8}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 19} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Reckless
entries: At the start of its turn, Romul can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls it makes during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: Romul deals double damage to objects and structures.

trait.name: Bloodlust
entries: Each successful attack by Romul generates a +1 bonus to its attack rolls (to a maximum of +5) and a +2 to its damage rolls (to a maximum of +10) to its first attack on its next turn. If the Romul misses with an attack or fails to attack, it loses these bonuses and starts again.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (2/Day)
entries: If the Romul fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Brothers Forever
entries: Romul has advantage on attack rolls if Rem is within 30 feet of him and Rem isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Relentless
entries: If Romul reduced to 0 hit points, it is reduced to 1 hit point instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Romul makes three attacks: two with its greataxe and one gore attack.

action.name: Greataxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 2d12 + 5}) slashing damage, plus 8 ({@damage 2d8}) fire damage.

action.name: Gore
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Unbreakable Will (1/day)
entries: If Romul fails s saving throw that would cause him to become {@condition paralyzed}, {@condition restrained}, {@condition stunned} or asleep, he automatically suceeds instead and becomes resistant to all damage. This resistance lasts until the end of next turn of the creature that forced him to make this saving throw.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Rem is a 8th level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 18}, +10 to hit with spell attacks). It has the following druid spells prepared:

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (2/Day)
entries: If Rem fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Nature's Fury
entries: When Rem casts a druid spell, it can make one Shillelagh Staff attack as a bonus action.

trait.name: Brothers Forever
entries: Rem has advantage on attack rolls if Romul is within 30 feet of him and Romul isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Shillelagh Staff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

reaction.name: Spell Reflection (3/day)
entries: If Rem makes a successful saving throw against a spell, or a spell attack misses it, Rem can choose another creature (including the spellcaster) it can see within 30 feet of him. The spell targets the chosen creature instead of Rem. If the spell forced a saving throw, the chosen creature makes its own save. If the spell was an attack, the attack roll is rerolled against the chosen creature.
